mapper.select: select num, title, contents, writer, regdate, hit from (select rownum as rown, nt.* from (select * from notice order by num desc) nt) where rown between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE=#{title} , CONTENTS=#{contents} WHERE NUM=#{num}
